Why EcoToy?

We are an independent family affair consisting of three generations who are dedicated to making a difference to our beautiful planet. We believe that education is key and that everyone can make a difference, no matter how big or small that may be.

Sustainable

We strive to ensure that products meet our own needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their needs.

Natural

Using natural products enables the reduction of chemicals in all that we have, be that toys or cosmetics.

Ethical & Fair Trade

Our aim is to help improve the livelihoods and well-being of producers in developing countries by promoting fair trade practices.
